summary: The module defines a set of lightweight utility classes that expose a variety of simple helper methods—class, static, instance, generator, and nested callable patterns—designed to exercise and verify the behavior of the __class__ cell and related introspection mechanisms, including interactions with C‑defined functions.
business_intent: Provide test scaffolding for the Cython test suite to ensure correct implementation of PEP 3135 (class cell handling) and to validate C extension interfaces that query class information.
